snippet.title: LUSHFOIL PHOTOGRAPHY SIM | Coming to PC, PS5 & Xbox Series X|S April 15
snippet.description:
Lushfoil Photography Sim is a first person photography sim, experience true-to-life recreations of beautiful and diverse locations around the world. Coming April 15, 2025 to PC on Steam, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S! 

Play the demo on Steam now!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1749860/Lushfoil_Photography_Sim/ 

Trek through and explore environments to capture stunning vistas and landscapes with your fully-featured in-game camera. Each environment is filled with objectives to reward players that have a good eye for angles and perspectives, and hidden secrets for those who are patient and observant.

Developed by Matt Newell. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2025
